Name: Toy - Hover Bubble
Description:
After using the prop, the normal attack button is replaced with the floating bubble button.
Click the button to be wrapped in a bubble and float in the air, and click the button again to stop. Click the exit toy button to restore the normal attack button.
Description$english:
After using the prop, the normal attack button is replaced with the floating bubble button.
Click the button to be wrapped in a bubble and float in the air, and click the button again to stop. Click the exit toy button to restore the normal attack button.
